alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:05PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Fremont and northeastern Custer Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 405 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Florence, or 13 miles northwest of Junkins Burn Scar, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Junkins Burn Scar, Florence, Canon City and Wetmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
